definitions.definition: a pliable sheetlike structure acting as a boundary, lining, or partition in an organism.
examples: layer, sheet, skin, film, tissue, integument, overlay; pellicle the sensitive membranes in the mouth

definitions.definition: a thin pliable sheet or skin of various kinds.
examples: the concrete should include a membrane to prevent water seepage
synonyms: overlay; technicalpellicle "the sensitive membranes in the mouth"

definitions.definition: a microscopic double layer of lipids and proteins that bounds cells and organelles and forms structures within cells.
